Sentencas: The application of solid oxide technology as a reversible system to renewable energy storage puts the attention on its operation and optimization under hydrogen feeding.
Titulo: Solid oxide fuel cell systems in hydrogen-based energy storage applications: Performance assessment in case of anode recirculation

Sentencas: To this aim, the effect of the anodic off-gas recirculation on the performance of a solid oxide fuel cell (SOFC) system fuelled with hydrogen is investigated.
Titulo: Solid oxide fuel cell systems in hydrogen-based energy storage applications: Performance assessment in case of anode recirculation

Sentencas: The layout presented includes the recirculation of anodic exhausts according to a variable rate, the condensation of the steam in the recirculated flow and the regeneration of the feeding flows.
Titulo: Solid oxide fuel cell systems in hydrogen-based energy storage applications: Performance assessment in case of anode recirculation

Sentencas: The operating parameters set in the 0-D developed model came from a test campaign aimed at determining SOFC performances varying the fuel utilization factor (U-f) and current density.
Titulo: Solid oxide fuel cell systems in hydrogen-based energy storage applications: Performance assessment in case of anode recirculation

Sentencas: In order to find the highest efficiency values, both fuel utilization factor and anode recirculation flow rate have been varied.
Titulo: Solid oxide fuel cell systems in hydrogen-based energy storage applications: Performance assessment in case of anode recirculation

Sentencas: Simulations results show the favorable effect on the system electrical efficiency for low utilization factor when operating with high anodic recirculate rates.
Titulo: Solid oxide fuel cell systems in hydrogen-based energy storage applications: Performance assessment in case of anode recirculation

Sentencas: With recirculation rates over 80 %, set the produced power, higher system energy conversion efficiencies up to 68.6 % are exhibited with lower cell U-f (down to 0.2).
Titulo: Solid oxide fuel cell systems in hydrogen-based energy storage applications: Performance assessment in case of anode recirculation

Sentencas: This design allows SOFC to overperform the best PEM performance recorded in literature.
Titulo: Solid oxide fuel cell systems in hydrogen-based energy storage applications: Performance assessment in case of anode recirculation
